name: Kost` Levytskyi
generalDescription: The commemorative coin with the face value of 2 hryvnias has been issued in pursuance of the President of Ukraine`s Decree `On Commemoration of Outstanding Figures of the Ukrainian People`s Republic and West Ukrainian People`s Republic` № 793 of May 16, 2005, and is dedicated to a Ukrainian legal expert, public and state figure, head of the Government of the West Ukrainian People`s Republic - Kost` Levytskyi.
averseDescription: On the obverse there are: the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine in the centre, the coin issue year indication 2009 thereunder, two semicircular inscriptions - Національний банк України (National Bank of Ukraine) above and ДВІ ГРИВНІ (two hryvnias) below together with the logotype of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint.
reverseDescription: On the reverse there is a portrait of Kost` Levytskyi, indication of the years of his life 1859-1941 (to the right) and the semicircular legend КОСТЬ ЛЕВИЦЬКИЙ (Kost` Levytskyi) to the left.
